name: Advanced Stitchwing

Flying

name: Agony Warp
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
Target creature gets -0/-3 until end of turn.

name: Ainok Bond-Kin
oracle_text:
Outlast {1}{W} ({1}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has first strike.

name: Ambuscade
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.

oracle_text:
Reach, trample
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

name: Anointer of Valor
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever a creature attacks, you may pay {3}. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
At the beginning of the end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, destroy Arachnus Web.

name: Auger Spree
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.
flavor_text:

—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

Flying

oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains first strike until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

name: Bloodflow Connoisseur
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodflow Connoisseur.

name: Brindle Shoat
oracle_text: When Brindle Shoat dies, create a 3/3 green Boar creature token.
flavor_text: Hunters lure the stripling boar into the open, hoping to trap greater prey.

name: Burning-Tree Emissary
oracle_text: When Burning-Tree Emissary enters the battlefield, add {R}{G}.
flavor_text: Those who regard the Gruul as savage simpletons underestimate the subtle power of their shamans.

name: Call to the Feast
oracle_text: Create three 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink.
flavor_text: By the law of church and crown, vampires feed only on the blood of the guilty—those declared heretics, rebels, or enemies of war.

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

name: Cartel Aristocrat
oracle_text: Sacrifice another creature: Cartel Aristocrat gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Your life serves a higher purpose now: ensuring the continuation of my own."

name: Chronicler of Heroes
oracle_text: When Chronicler of Heroes enters the battlefield, draw a card if you control a creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: She paints pictures with words, though not all pictures show the truth.

name: Coiling Oracle
oracle_text: When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.
flavor_text: Snaking remnants of nature directed by a body of thought and progress, the oracles embody all that is Simic.

name: Cryptic Spires
oracle_text:
As you create your deck, circle two of the colors below.
Cryptic Spires enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of either of the circled colors.

name: Dark-Dweller Oracle
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. You can play a land this way only if you have an available land play remaining.)
flavor_text: Eyes are unnecessary for seeing the future.

name: Deadly Recluse
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

Target player draws two cards.

name: Disfigure
oracle_text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
